      One  fateful night,  Rufus awakes  from a  haunting  nightmare:  he
      sacrificed himself to save Deponia. But at what price? Elysium, the
      floating city crash-landed on the  planet. As  the  last  surviving
      Deponian, he fought savage fewlocks, but in the end, there was only
      one way out: He had to blow up Deponia! And... He grew  a mustache.
      Of course he realized that these gruesome  events  -especially  the
      mustache part- had to be prevented from ever happening.

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/421050/
